msContents.summary: The title mentioned on the Manuscript is Bhojacaritram but the text is known as Bhojaprabandha. The present text end does not match with the published editions of Bhojaprabandha. Manuscript ends at the Bhoja-gopakanyayoḥ part 67 according to the edition The Bhojaprabandha by Sree Ballala (with English Translation) by Saradaproasad Vidyabhushan, third edition Calacutta, S, C, Auddy and co., Calcutta: 1926.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio and 57 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals are used to number folio. Folio 57 is not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Some worm eaten parts on the blank folio. black patches are seen. Many folio are damaged at the edges but does not affect the written area.

handNote.desc: Well written. Clean and big letters.

additions.desc: Tamil numerals are used for folioation in the left margin. 1v to 56v are numbered and 57 is not numbered.

Front guard folio with title Bo[ja]carittam and shelf mark stickers with printed number 68 and 35-3307. Also number 68 is written in pink pencil. Back side has some traces of worms and half thin layer of wood is removed.
The blank folio after the from guard has title in the centre Bojacaritaṃ .
śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ hariḥ oṃ śrīrastu in the left margin of the frist folio.
bhojacaritraṃ in the left margin of the first folio.

[1v 1] śrīmatorājarājasyabhojarājasya prabandhaḥ ādau dhārārājye bandhulasaṃjñau ciraṃ prajāḥ paryapālaya [1v 2] t . āsya ca vṛddhatve bhojarāja iti putrassamajani . sa yadā pañcavārṣikastadātmano jarāṃ jñātvā mukhyāmātyānāhū [1v 3] ya anujaṃ muñjamāha(ba)[bā]lamālokya putraṃ ca bālaṃ vīkṣya vīcārayāmasa
[57r 8] bhojanivallabhanṃeghaṃ cātakamaṇḍalīva madhupaśreṇīvapuṣpaśrīyaṃ mākandāpikasundarīva ramaṇīvātmeśvaraṃ proṣite cetovṛttiriyam sadā [57r 9] nṛpavara tvāṃ draṣṭumutkaṇṭhate rājā camatkṛtā prāha sukuṃāri tvāṃ līlā divyānumatyā svīkurmmaḥ iti dhārānaraṃ nītvā tathaiva svīkṛtavān hariḥ oṃ
